name: @lumaxis/platform
description: A platform detection library that works on nearly all JavaScript platforms.

scripts.doc: docdown platform.js doc/README.md style=github title="Platform.js <sup>v${npm_package_version}</sup>" toc=properties url=https://github.com/bestiejs/platform.js/blob/${npm_package_version}/platform.js
